channel.title: Cross training on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Cross training on Mianshi Handbook

item.description: huddle meeting, cross-training. The technologist A was asked to train the technologist B on ICP. Both of them did not get alone. Technologist A insisted that technologist B can’t run the routine sample until they are proficient. Karen suggested to train technologist B on QC samples. What did I do to train Kent on GCMS? Karen addressed the matter rather than conflicts.
